title: Restore & ship Skill Tree UX fixes
description: Recover the broken Skill Tree router/tests, then implement the responsive viewport, tooltip/arrow fixes, and unified student flow that were missing from 2025-12-03-1.

chain.task: Confirm updated scope/timeline, restate spec (2025-12-03-1 goals + recovery plan), and align stakeholders.
Restore `app/routers/skills.py` and related modules, reapply intended logic (practice-plan, fallbacks) in valid Python, and ensure pytest passes.
Implement responsive Skill Tree layout, collision-free tooltips/arrows, and merge the student dashboard flow (CTA + confirmation modal, legacy copy removal).
Review/adjust designs for the merged dashboard + skill flow, ensuring copy and interactions match Diablo-style goals.
Regression test `/api/v1/skills/*`, practice-plan endpoint, and desktop/mobile Skill Tree UX; attach evidence for telemetry events.
Final integration review verifying code quality, tests, and adherence to the original spec before merge.
